name: Sterling Silver Necklace With Swarovski Tear Drop Pendant
description:
This is a beautiful sterling silver snake chain necklace with a genuine Swarovski tear drop pendant. 
The chain measures 46cm from one end to another (including clasp)
The tear drop measures approximately 2.9cm in length.

This sterling silver chain is hallmarked 925. 

This item will come to you in a beautiful little gift box and hand tied with satin ribbon. Perfect for a gift for that someone special. 

*****For a limited time only, buy this necklace and recieve a FREE pair of silver plated Swarovski crystal beaded ear rings.*****

name: Swarovski Bracelet
description:
This is a beautiful genuine Swarovski beaded bracelet. 
This bracelet comes in mixed colour beads (like the picture) or clear crystal. 
You can also choose the type of fastening for no extra charge, choosing either the Albert Fastening (like the picture) also known as a T Bar, or the standard lobster clasp.

The bracelet including either clasp will be approximately 18cm long, if there is a specific size you require please feel free to contact me. (There maybe a small charge if the bracelet exceeds 20cm long)

Please be aware, the Albert Fastener ONLY comes in silver plated at the moment but the Lobster clasp is available in both silver and gold plated. 
Please make your selection when paying for the item.

name: Silver Plated Spiral Gift Set With Crystal Centre
description:
This is a beautiful, silver plated spiral gift set. It includes a necklace and a pair of matching ear rings. 
The chain length is approximately 49cm in length from one end to another and has a lobster clasp fastening, also silver plated. 
The spiral cage on both the chain and ear rings is approximately 1.5cm. 
The crystals that come inside the bead cages are available in:
Pink
Red
Blue
Green
Brown
Purple
Yellow

Please specify the colour you require. 

This is idel for a gift for yourself or a loved one. It will come in a pretty little gift box, hand tied with satin ribbon that matches the colour of your chosen crystals.
